item.title: About me
item.author: masa.sumimoto@gmail.com (Masaaki Sumimoto)
item.description: Hi! Born in 1982. male. My name is Masaaki Sumimoto (住本 雅彰) a.k.a Masa Sumimoto. I am a Frontend Developer, Based in Kobe, Japan. Both as a hobby and for work, I make websites, web services, Design and Music. My favorite time is to ride very slowly on a sports bike in the city of Kobe. Skills The following are my strengths and things I usually work on. Programming I use HTML5, CSS(SCSS), JavaScript frequently.
